name: Chain
description:
Chain is a 2D action-adventure open world game inspired by the great Game Boy era.
explore a vast island made up of different biomes in search of the seven magical petals, hindered by a powerful curse that relocates every object inside the chests at will. Obtain useful weapons and magic to skillfully progress on your journey. Fight your way through dangerous dungeons and mysterious caves that span the entire map. Fight against tough enemies and be wary of even the cutest of creatures. The road may seem arduous but don't be afraid, the key to your success is exploration, the more you explore the more powerful you will become. The question you need to ask yourself now is: Will you be able to conquer the island or will it prevail over you?
